english.segment1: I hear those noises. All those familiar voices. Always desturbing in the night time. When can I rest my head in peace and silence?. Knowing what I've done is right.
english.segment2: False comfort is no more. Will i hang my head in shame?. No longer will I play this game. This time I'll get it right. This time I won't back down from this battle in my mind.
english.segment3: You try and laugh but I don't care if I please you. Go ahead and laugh some more. You think you're seperate, different from all the rest. You try but you're just like us all.
english.segment4: False comfort is no more. Will I hang my head in shame?. No longer will I play this game. This time I'll get it right. This time I won't back down from this battle in my mind.
english.segment5: False comfort is no more. Will I hang my head in shame?. No longer will I play this game. This time I'll get it right. This time I won't back down from this battle in my mind.
